skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Hover over an icon to get more information.
skills.description-mobile: Click on an icon to get more information

html5.title: HTML 5
html5.description: HTML, which stands for HyperText Markup Language, is the standard language for creating web pages and web applications. It is a markup language, meaning it structures the content on the web, defining, for instance, paragraphs, headings, images, or videos on a website.

css3.title: CSS 3
css3.description: CSS, which stands for Cascading Style Sheets, is a style language used to describe the appearance and formatting of a document written in HTML. CSS is responsible for controlling the layout of multiple pages at once, including design aspects such as the color scheme, font sizes, spacing, column layout, and more.

javascript.title: JavaScript
javascript.description: Programming language primarily used to add interactivity to web pages on the client side, although it is also used on the back-end with Node.js.

react.title: React
react.description: JavaScript library for creating user interfaces on web pages, known for its efficiency and flexibility. Utilizes a model of reusable components.

sapui5.title: SAP UI5
sapui5.description: Set of JavaScript libraries developed by SAP for creating rich and responsive enterprise web applications.

azure.title: Azure DevOps
azure.description: Microsoft's software development toolset that facilitates continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD), project management, code version control, and other aspects of the software development process.

git.title: Git
git.description: Distributed version control system that allows multiple developers to work on a project simultaneously without code conflicts.

gitlab.title: Gitlab
gitlab.description: Git repository management platform that provides a set of tools for the software development lifecycle, including code management, issue tracking, continuous integration/continuous delivery, and more.

figma.title: Figma
figma.description: Cloud-based design tool that allows for real-time collaboration. It is used to create wireframes, prototypes, and other design materials.

photoshop.title: Adobe Photoshop
photoshop.description: Image editing program developed by Adobe, widely used by graphic designers and photographers to create and modify digital images.
